name: Buck
text: kamo >aholakonaA min qabolihim m~in qaronK fanaAdawA@ w~alaAta Hiyna manaASK

text: >a'unzila Ealayohi {l*~ikoru min[ bayoninaA balo humo fiY $ak~K m~in *ikoriY bal l~am~aA ya*uwquwA@ Ea*aAbi

text: {Sobiro EalaY` maA yaquwluwna wa{*okuro EabodanaA daAwu,da *aA {lo>ayodi <in~ahu,^ >aw~aAbN

text: <i*o daxaluwA@ EalaY` daAwu,da fafaziEa minohumo qaAluwA@ laA taxafo xaSomaAni bagaY` baEoDunaA EalaY` baEoDK fa{Hokum bayonanaA bi{loHaq~i walaA tu$oTiTo wa{hodinaA^ <ilaY` sawaA^'i {lS~ira`Ti

text: <in~a ha`*aA^ >axiY lahu, tisoEN watisoEuwna naEojapF waliYa naEojapN wa`HidapN faqaAla >akofiloniyhaA waEaz~aniY fiY {loxiTaAbi

name: Buck
text: qaAla laqado Zalamaka bisu&aAli naEojatika <ilaY` niEaAjihi. wa<in~a kaviyrFA m~ina {loxulaTaA^'i layabogiY baEoDuhumo EalaY` baEoDK <il~aA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti waqaliylN m~aA humo waZan~a daAwu,du >an~amaA fatan~a`hu fa{sotagofara rab~ahu, waxar~a raAkiEFA wa>anaAba

name: Buck
text: fagafaronaA lahu, *a`lika wa<in~a lahu, EindanaA lazulofaY` waHusona ma_#aAbK

text: ya`daAwu,du <in~aA jaEalona`ka xaliyfapF fiY {lo>aroDi fa{Hokum bayona {ln~aAsi bi{loHaq~i walaA tat~abiEi {lohawaY` fayuDil~aka Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi <in~a {l~a*iyna yaDil~uwna Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi lahumo Ea*aAbN $adiydN[ bimaA nasuwA@ yawoma {loHisaAbi

name: Buck
text: wamaA xalaqonaA {ls~amaA^'a wa{lo>aroDa wamaA bayonahumaA ba`TilFA *a`lika Zan~u {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ fawayolN l~il~a*iyna kafaruwA@ mina {ln~aAri

text: >amo najoEalu {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti ka{lomufosidiyna fiY {lo>aroDi >amo najoEalu {lomut~aqiyna ka{lofuj~aAri

name: Buck
text: faqaAla <in~iY^ >aHobabotu Hub~a {loxayori Ean *ikori rab~iY Hat~aY` tawaArato bi{loHijaAbi

text: rud~uwhaA EalaY~a faTafiqa masoHF[A bi{ls~uwqi wa{lo>aEonaAqi

name: Buck
text: walaqado fatan~aA sulayoma`na wa>aloqayonaA EalaY` kurosiy~ihi. jasadFA vum~a >anaAba

text: qaAla rab~i {gofiro liY wahabo liY mulokFA l~aA yan[bagiY li>aHadK m~in[ baEodiY^ <in~aka >anta {lowah~aAbu

text: wa<in~a lahu, EindanaA lazulofaY` waHusona ma_#aAbK

text: wa{*okuro EabodanaA^ >ay~uwba <i*o naAdaY` rab~ahu,^ >an~iY mas~aniYa {l$~ayoTa`nu binuSobK waEa*aAbK

text: wawahabonaA lahu,^ >aholahu, wamivolahum m~aEahumo raHomapF m~in~aA wa*ikoraY` li>uw@liY {lo>aloba`bi

text: waxu*o biyadika DigovFA fa{Dorib b~ihi. walaA taHonavo <in~aA wajadona`hu SaAbirFA n~iEoma {loEabodu <in~ahu,^ >aw~aAbN

name: Buck
text: mut~aki_#iyna fiyhaA yadoEuwna fiyhaA bifa`kihapK kaviyrapK wa$araAbK

text: <in~a ha`*aA larizoqunaA maA lahu, min n~afaAdK

text: maA kaAna liYa mino EilomK] bi{lomala<i {lo>aEolaY`^ <i*o yaxotaSimuwna

text: <i*o qaAla rab~uka lilomala`^}ikapi <in~iY xa`liqN[ ba$arFA m~in TiynK

text: fa<i*aA saw~ayotuhu, wanafaxotu fiyhi min r~uwHiY faqaEuwA@ lahu, sa`jidiyna
